# Panhandle Key & Safe

> Professional locksmith services in Panama City, FL since 1984

## About
Panhandle Key & Safe is a family-owned locksmith business serving Panama City, Florida and surrounding areas for over 40 years. We provide fast, reliable locksmith services for automotive, residential, and commercial needs.

## Services

### Automotive Locksmith
- Car lockouts and emergency access
- Key replacement and duplication
- Transponder key programming
- Ignition repair and replacement
- All makes and models serviced

### Residential Locksmith
- Lock installation and replacement
- Rekeying services
- Emergency lockout assistance
- Home security solutions
- Deadbolt installation

### Commercial Locksmith
- Master key systems
- Access control solutions
- High-security lock installation
- Commercial lock repair
- Business security consulting

### Safe Services
- Safe opening and lockouts
- Safe installation
- Combination changes
- Safe repair and maintenance
- Authorized Hollon dealer

## Contact Information
- Phone: (850) 769-3030
- Email: panhandlekey1@yahoo.com
- Address: 1316 Jenks Ave, Panama City, FL 32401

## Business Hours
- Monday - Friday: 7:30 AM - 5:00 PM
- Saturday - Sunday: Closed

## Service Area
Panama City, FL and surrounding Bay County areas

https://www.panhandlekeyandsafe.com
